(Dang, I was hoping I'd never run into stuff like this.  Just try and 
kill one little Maximal and I pay for it with my sanity...

Ok...anyway, well, if I were to respond to Lunaprine's attacks, that 
would make void what Serpentor had done in the engine room, which 
would screw up even more stuff in the engine room.  

So...Lunaprine/Cyberwolf, when did you open fire on Serpentor?  When 
he was standing over Shadow Wing, his plasma launcher aimed at her 
head about to fire?  That's an important question I need to know)
